summary: All of the worthy files compiled into an user friendly resource.
descriptionHtml:
Why Hello!

I have created this file for ease of access. That is it.Â 

All I did was compile files in an user friendly resource free for anyone to use.

I DID NOT make the meshes or textures in this file...if you want to know who did...check the credits section on this page or in the file itself.

This is technically my first mod...since it is the first I've ever uploaded...so there may (or may not) be mistakes.

If I have made a mistake LET ME KNOW.

If I have failed to credit someone...LET ME KNOW!!!

I do not want to avoid giving credit where credit is due.

Thank you to the modding community for providing us with your work for free. We appreciate it immensely.

XOXO- Ari
author: Zdaclash
